title: Goldman Raising $16 Billion in Record Wall Street Bank Bond Sale
description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. raised $16 billion with the largest investment-grade bond sale ever from a Wall Street bank, leading a surge of borrowing by big lenders that’s kicking off what’s expected to be a record year of corporate bond issuance.
content: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. raised $16 billion with the largest investment-grade bond sale ever from a Wall Street bank, leading a surge of borrowing by big lenders that’s kicking off what’s expected to be a record year of corporate bond issuance.
